name: s3-cloudfront-deployment-sample
description: Sample static website for AWS CLI component demonstration

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:assets
scripts.build:assets: if [ -d src/images ]; then mkdir -p dist/images && cp -r src/images/* dist/images/; fi
